name: Digital Grimoire
description:
Nobody Knows All Magic

Digital Grimoire is the Master's Class of Magic--expanding on Street Magic, it details additional traditions, magical groups & threats, spirits, enchanting expansions, and a handful of new spells and adept powers. Traditions: Egyptian, Rastafarian, Psionic Magical Groups: Shrine of the Southern Winds, The Oxford Grand Lodge, Código 515 Magical Threats: Toxic Paths, Shadow Spirits, Insect Spirits Digital Grimoire is 18 pages (including cover): a bite-sized expansion to Shadowrun, Fourth Edition and Street Magic.
notes: The German edition of Street Magic incorporates the translation of Digital Grimoire.
